hero.title: Reclaim your time,
hero.subtitle: Expert generative AI consulting tailored for maritime & technology sector. Free your team from routine work and gain the competitive insights you need to stay ahead.

about.title: About DriftAI
about.subtitle: We understand maritime operations & technology development. We leverage generative AI to free your team from routine work and deliver the competitive insights you need to stay ahead.
about.bio1: Andreas Buskop is a Senior Business Developer and Naval Architect with 16+ years of experience bridging technical complexity with commercial viability in the energy and maritime sectors. Currently pursuing an Executive Master in Management – Applied AI at BI Norwegian Business School, he combines deep maritime domain expertise with emerging AI capabilities to solve real operational challenges.
about.bio2: At Statkraft, he led business development for large-scale maritime energy hubs, developing integrated value chain strategies and leading market expansion initiatives. Previously at VARD, he transformed traditional engineering into a sustainability-focused innovation hub, positioning the company as a leader in zero-emission maritime solutions.
about.bio3: Andreas founded DriftAI to bridge the critical gap between cutting-edge generative AI capabilities and practical industry needs. By leveraging Python, AI automation, and strategic consulting expertise, he helps companies reclaim time from routine operations and amplify strategic decision-making. His approach combines proven commercial acumen, technical depth, and deep maritime domain knowledge to deliver measurable ROI.

services.title: What We Offer
services.subtitle: Our consulting services combine maritime & engineering domain expertise with cutting-edge generative AI to solve your most pressing operational challenges.

strategy.title: AI Strategy Consulting for Maritime Operations
strategy.description: We assess your operations and identify high-impact AI implementation opportunities through strategic consultation.
features: ROI projections and business case development

development.title: Custom AI Application Development
development.description: We design and build tailored generative AI applications for your specific workflows—purpose-built, not generic.
features: Agentic AI model integration and optimization

issue.title: Operational Issue Analysis & Impact Assessment
issue.description: When operational issues arise, our AI-powered analysis quickly assesses impact, estimates costs, and recommends mitigation strategies.

rag.title: Local RAG Models & Engineering Data Intelligence
rag.description: Consolidate fragmented design and engineering data with local AI models that give you complete control and unlock value.
features: Local RAG model for data sovereignty
AI co-pilot for engineers and designers

services.cta: Ready to transform your operations? Schedule a consultation

caseStudy.title: Featured Projects
caseStudy.subtitle: Explore our AI-powered solutions transforming maritime operations and business processes.

maritime.name: Maritime Operations Hub
maritime.description: A next-generation maritime management platform combining real-time vessel tracking with AI to transform how shipping companies optimize routes, manage fleets, and make data-driven decisions. Processes live AIS data from 4,300+ vessels across Northern European waters.

softfunding.name: Softfunding CoPilot
softfunding.description: Your AI-powered navigator for funding opportunities. Automatically discovers relevant opportunities across Norwegian and EU funding sources, matches them to your projects, generates application drafts, and learns from outcomes to improve future success rates.

expertise.title: Skills & Expertise
expertise.subtitle: Combining deep maritime domain knowledge with modern AI technologies and proven methodologies
expertise.method1Desc: Deeply understand your operations, challenges, and objectives before recommending solutions.
expertise.method2Desc: Prioritize solutions that deliver measurable ROI and integrate seamlessly with existing operations.
expertise.method3Desc: Roll out AI solutions in phases to minimize disruption and build organizational capability.
expertise.method4Desc: Position AI as a capability multiplier—amplifying expertise and freeing teams for strategy.
expertise.method5Desc: Monitor performance, gather feedback, and evolve solutions based on real-world results.
expertise.method6Desc: Maintain clear communication about capabilities, limitations, and expected outcomes.
